name: The Final Word
description:
The Final Word

A Microsoft Word-themed endless platformer.

Yes that's right, you too can relive all the pain, suffering and injustice of Word 97, but in the medium platform gaming!

Controls

WASD to move. Controllers probably work too.

Credits / notes

Character sprite drawn by Raeya (recycled from a previous entry).

All other graphics by me, except those which are obviously lifted from Microsoft Word. Which is a lot of them.
